title: CODE_PHRASE
description: A fully coordinated (i.e. all coordination has been performed) term from a terminology service (as distinct from a particular terminology).

terminology_id.description: Identifier of the distinct terminology from which the code_string (or its elements) was extracted.

code_string.description: The key used by the terminology service to identify a concept or coordination of concepts. This string is most likely parsable inside the terminology service, but nothing can be assumed about its syntax outside that context.
